attributes.action: allow third parties the right to appeal against planning decisions to a truly independent tribunal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently council planning officers in England can make planning decisions without complying with planning procedure, guidance or reference to the council planning committee. If a third party, for example a neighbour, is negatively impacted by a planning decision made in this way they have no right of appeal contrary to natural justice and good practice in most civilised countries.
